title: Kiss Person Man Medium Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic kiss between a man and another person, with the man's skin tone depicted as medium-light. It signifies affection, love, and intimacy.
apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji, as rendered on Apple devices, features two men sharing a gentle kiss, their faces brought together with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. The realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading give the figures a lifelike presence, conveying warmth and affection. On Apple devices, this representation beautifully symbolizes romantic love, intimacy, and a deep connection between two men, offering an inclusive and heartfelt expression.
